content.raw:
These builds failed because the `WideAngleCamera::Project(Vector3d)` that returns `Vector3d` has the same signature as `Camera::Project(Vector3d)` that returns `Vector2i`. To fix this, we'll probably have to change the function name both here and on gazebo7 so the API matches. We haven't released gazebo7 yet with this change, so we can still fix it.

Maybe rename to `WideAngleCamera::Project3d`?

cc: @iche033
content.html:
These builds failed because the WideAngleCamera::Project(Vector3d) that returns Vector3d has the same signature as Camera::Project(Vector3d) that returns Vector2i. To fix this, we'll probably have to change the function name both here and on gazebo7 so the API matches. We haven't released gazebo7 yet with this change, so we can still fix it.

Maybe rename to WideAngleCamera::Project3d?

cc: @iche033
